## Singularity.getLastNodeReset() method

Get the last timestamp from when you finished a bitnode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getLastNodeReset(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The timestamp in milliseconds from your last bitnode finish.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.5 GB \* 16/4/1
